metadata.title: Doppler VPN — Free VPN No Registration | Private & Secure
metadata.description: Free VPN with no email or sign up required. Connect instantly with WireGuard encryption, built-in ad blocker & content filter. No logs. No data caps. Available on iOS, Android & Telegram.

features.title: Designed for Complete Privacy
features.subtitle: Most VPNs ask for your email before protecting your privacy. Doppler doesn't.

noRegistration.title: Privacy Without Registration
noRegistration.description: Your device serves as your account. No email. No phone number. No personal information. Privacy begins the moment you connect.

dualProtocol.title: WireGuard + VLESS-Reality
dualProtocol.description: Two protocols, one service. WireGuard for speed and battery. VLESS-Reality for bypassing censorship. Our servers support both — use whichever fits your situation.

adBlocker.title: Built-in Ad Blocker
adBlocker.description: Network-level blocking removes up to 75% of ads, trackers, and pop-ups. Faster page loads, less data usage, cleaner browsing.

contentFilter.title: Content Filter & Parental Controls
contentFilter.description: Block specific websites or entire categories. Password-protect settings. Create a safer internet for your family.

minimalData.title: Minimal Data Collection
minimalData.description: We don't log your browsing activity. We don't track websites you visit. Our architecture requires minimal data by design.

completelyFree.title: Completely Free
completelyFree.description: All servers are free with full functionality. Full encryption, fast speeds, unlimited bandwidth. No throttling or data caps.

howItWorks.title: Get started in seconds
howItWorks.subtitle: No registration, no hassle - just download and connect

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Doppler VPN

what.question: What is Doppler VPN?
what.answer: Doppler VPN is a privacy-focused virtual private network service that encrypts your internet connection and hides your IP address. It includes built-in ad blocking, content filtering by category, and support for custom blocklists - all without requiring registration.

noLogs.question: Is Doppler VPN really no-logs?
noLogs.answer: Yes, we operate a strict no-logs policy. We don't track, store, or share any of your browsing activity, connection timestamps, IP addresses, or any other personal data. Your privacy is our priority.

adBlocker.question: How does the ad blocker work?
adBlocker.answer: Our ad blocker works at the DNS level, blocking ads, trackers, and malicious domains before they even load. This means faster browsing, less data usage, and protection across all your apps - not just your browser.

categories.question: What content categories can I filter?
categories.answer: You can filter content across multiple categories including adult content, gambling, social media, gaming, streaming, and more. You can also import custom blocklists for additional content filtering control.

devices.question: How many devices can I use?
devices.answer: A single Doppler VPN subscription covers up to 10 devices simultaneously. Use it on your phones, tablets, and computers - all protected at once.

platforms.question: What platforms are supported?
platforms.answer: Doppler VPN is available on iOS (iPhone & iPad), macOS, and Android. We're constantly working on expanding our platform support.

cancel.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
cancel.answer: You can cancel your subscription anytime through your device's app store (App Store for iOS/macOS or Google Play for Android). Your access continues until the end of your billing period. You will not be charged after cancellation.

trial.question: Is there a free trial?
trial.answer: Yes! Every new user gets a 7-day free trial with full access to all Premium features. The trial converts to a paid subscription unless canceled at least 24 hours before it ends. We also offer a 30-day money-back guarantee.

whatIsIncluded.question: What is included in Premium?
whatIsIncluded.answer: Premium includes VPN servers in 50+ locations with WireGuard encryption, DNS-level ad blocker that works across all apps, content filter with parental controls, and connection on up to 10 devices simultaneously.

plans.question: What subscription plans are available?
plans.answer: We offer three plans: Monthly, 6-Month, and Yearly. All plans include the same Premium features. Longer plans offer a lower per-month price. Subscriptions auto-renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the billing period.

restore.question: I subscribed but my features aren't working
restore.answer: Open the app, go to Profile > Subscription and tap Restore Purchases. This will re-sync your subscription with our servers. If the issue persists, contact our support team at support@simnetiq.store or contact @DopplerSupportBot on Telegram.

refund.question: How do I request a refund?
refund.answer: Refunds are processed by Apple or Google. For iOS, visit reportaproblem.apple.com and sign in with your Apple ID. For Android, open Google Play > Account > Order history. Refunds are typically processed within 48 hours.

doppler.subtitle: Privacy-first VPN with no registration. Connect instantly with WireGuard encryption.

simnetiq.subtitle: Global eSIM data plans for travelers. Stay connected anywhere in the world.

footer.description: Privacy-first VPN with advanced ad blocking and content filtering.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Doppler VPN, your privacy is our top priority. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle your information when you use our VPN, ad blocking, and content filtering services.

noLogs.title: No-Logs Policy
noLogs.content: We operate a strict no-logs policy. We do not track, store, or share any of the following: your browsing activity, connection timestamps, originating IP addresses, DNS queries, bandwidth usage, or any other data that could identify you or your online activities. VPN traffic is encrypted end-to-end and is never inspected, logged, or stored.

collect.title: What We Collect
collect.content: We only collect the minimum information necessary to provide our service: a randomly generated device identifier (not linked to your personal identity), payment information (processed securely by Apple App Store or Google Play — we never see your payment details), anonymous aggregated server load statistics to maintain performance, and your email address only if you voluntarily contact support.

vpnData.title: VPN Data Handling
vpnData.content: When you connect to our VPN service, your internet traffic is encrypted using the WireGuard protocol and routed through our servers. We do not inspect, log, store, modify, or sell any data that passes through our VPN tunnel. Our DNS-level ad blocker and content filter operate on our DNS resolver and do not log individual queries or browsing patterns.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We use industry-standard encryption protocols including WireGuard to protect your connection. All data transmission between your device and our servers is encrypted end-to-end. Our server infrastructure is configured to minimize data retention by design.

thirdParty.title: Third Parties
thirdParty.content: We do not sell, trade, or share your personal information with third parties. We use RevenueCat for subscription management (they process only anonymous purchase identifiers) and Apple/Google app stores for payment processing. These providers are bound by their own privacy policies and contractual obligations.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our content filtering feature includes parental control capabilities. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. The content filter operates at the DNS level without collecting or storing any personal data about users of any age.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@simnetiq.store

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using Doppler VPN, you agree to these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully.

service.title: Service Description
service.content: Doppler VPN provides a virtual private network service that encrypts your internet connection and hides your IP address for privacy purposes. The service also includes DNS-level ad blocking and content filtering with parental controls. The service is provided "as is" and "as available."

usage.title: Acceptable Use
usage.content: You agree to use Doppler VPN only for lawful purposes and in compliance with all applicable local, national, and international laws. You may not use the service for any illegal activities, to harm others, to distribute malware, to infringe on intellectual property rights, or to interfere with our service operations. We reserve the right to terminate accounts that violate these terms.

subscription.title: Subscriptions & Payments
subscription.content: Doppler VPN Premium includes access to premium VPN servers in 50+ locations, DNS-level ad blocking, content filtering with parental controls, and connection on up to 10 devices simultaneously. Subscriptions are billed through the Apple App Store or Google Play Store. Plans are available on a monthly, 6-month, or annual basis and auto-renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing period. You can cancel your subscription at any time through your device's app store settings. Refunds are subject to the respective app store's refund policies.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Doppler VPN shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of the service.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes through the app or via email. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at support@simnetiq.store

guide.title: Setup Guide
guide.subtitle: Get connected in minutes. Choose your device to begin.

android.title: Android Setup
android.subtitle: Set up Doppler VPN on your Android device
android.step1Desc: Install V2RayNG from Google Play Store or download the APK from GitHub.
android.step2Desc: Open our Telegram bot @dopplercreatebot, tap "Connect VPN", choose a server, and you'll receive a VLESS config link.
android.step3Desc: Long-press the VLESS link to copy it. Open V2RayNG → tap the + button → select "Import config from clipboard".
android.step4Desc: Tap the play button to connect. Allow VPN permission when prompted. You're now protected!
android.troubleshoot1: If connection fails, try a different server location in the bot.
android.troubleshoot2: Make sure V2RayNG has battery optimization disabled.
android.troubleshoot3: For help, message @DopplerSupportBot on Telegram — our AI support is available 24/7.

ios.title: iOS Setup
ios.subtitle: Set up Doppler VPN on your iPhone or iPad
ios.step1Desc: Install Streisand from the App Store. It's free and supports VLESS protocol.
ios.step2Desc: Open our Telegram bot @dopplercreatebot, tap "Connect VPN", choose a server, and you'll receive a VLESS config link.
ios.step3Desc: Long-press the VLESS link to copy it. Open Streisand → tap + → "Import from clipboard". Allow the VPN configuration when prompted.
ios.step4Desc: Tap the toggle to connect. Your traffic is now encrypted and protected!
ios.troubleshoot1: If the VPN won't connect, try removing and re-importing the config.
ios.troubleshoot2: Ensure Streisand has permission to add VPN configurations in Settings > General > VPN.
ios.troubleshoot3: For help, message @DopplerSupportBot on Telegram — our AI support is available 24/7.

windows.title: Windows Setup
windows.subtitle: Set up Doppler VPN on your Windows PC
windows.step1Desc: Download v2rayN from GitHub. Extract the ZIP file and run v2rayN.exe.
windows.step2Desc: Open our Telegram bot @dopplercreatebot, tap "Connect VPN", choose a server, and you'll receive a VLESS config link.
windows.step3Desc: Copy the VLESS link. In v2rayN, click "Server" → "Import from clipboard" or press Ctrl+V.
windows.step4Desc: Right-click the v2rayN tray icon and select "System proxy" → "Set as system proxy". You're connected!
windows.troubleshoot1: Make sure Windows Defender or your antivirus isn't blocking v2rayN.
windows.troubleshoot3: For help, message @DopplerSupportBot on Telegram — our AI support is available 24/7.

mac.title: macOS Setup
mac.subtitle: Set up Doppler VPN on your Mac
mac.step1Desc: Download V2RayXS from GitHub or install Streisand from the Mac App Store.
mac.step2Desc: Open our Telegram bot @dopplercreatebot, tap "Connect VPN", choose a server, and you'll receive a VLESS config link.
mac.step3Desc: Copy the VLESS link. Open V2RayXS → "Import" → "From clipboard". Or in Streisand, tap + → "Import from clipboard".
mac.step4Desc: Click the connect button. Allow the VPN configuration when macOS prompts you. Done!
mac.troubleshoot1: If macOS blocks the app, go to System Preferences > Privacy & Security and allow it.
mac.troubleshoot2: Try restarting the app if the connection drops.
mac.troubleshoot3: For help, message @DopplerSupportBot on Telegram — our AI support is available 24/7.

apps.title: Get Doppler VPN
apps.subtitle: One-tap privacy on every device. Choose your platform below.
apps.vlessNote: For Telegram bot users in restricted regions

guideProtocols.title: VPN Protocols
guideProtocols.subtitle: Doppler supports two VPN protocols — WireGuard and VLESS-Reality. Each serves a different purpose. Choose the one that fits your situation.

wireguard.title: WireGuard
wireguard.description: A modern, lightweight VPN protocol trusted by security professionals. WireGuard offers the fastest connections, best battery efficiency, and military-grade encryption. This is what the Doppler VPN app uses natively.
wireguard.speed: Maximum speed — outperforms OpenVPN and IKEv2
wireguard.battery: Minimal battery drain on mobile devices

vless.title: VLESS-Reality
vless.description: An advanced proxy protocol designed to bypass deep packet inspection (DPI) and network censorship. VLESS-Reality disguises VPN traffic as regular HTTPS, making it nearly undetectable. Used via our Telegram bot.
vless.stealth: Undetectable traffic — looks like normal HTTPS
vless.restricted: Accessing internet in Russia, China, Iran, and other restricted regions

censorship.label: Censorship bypass
censorship.wireguard: Basic — can be blocked by DPI

useWireguard.title: Use WireGuard if...
useWireguard.desc: You want the simplest experience with the best performance. Just download the Doppler VPN app and tap connect — no configuration needed. Perfect for everyday browsing, streaming, and privacy.

useVless.title: Use VLESS-Reality if...
useVless.desc: You're in a country with internet censorship (Russia, China, Iran, etc.) or your ISP blocks VPN connections. Get your config from our Telegram bot @dopplercreatebot and use a third-party client app.

guideSubscription.title: Subscription & Pricing
guideSubscription.subtitle: Everything about Doppler VPN plans, pricing across platforms, promo codes, and how to manage your subscription.

promo.title: Launch promo — 20% off all plans
promo.desc: Use code LAUNCH20 at checkout in the Telegram bot to get 20% off any subscription plan. Available for all new and existing users.

guideSubscription.pricingNote: Telegram bot prices are lower because there are no app store commissions. All plans include the same Premium features.

appStoreMethod.title: Via App Store (iOS)
appStoreMethod.step1: Open the Doppler VPN app on your iPhone or iPad
appStoreMethod.step2: Go to Profile tab and tap "Upgrade to Premium"
appStoreMethod.step3: Choose your plan and confirm with Face ID or Apple ID

googlePlayMethod.title: Via Google Play (Android)
googlePlayMethod.step1: Open the Doppler VPN app on your Android device
googlePlayMethod.step2: Go to Profile tab and tap "Upgrade to Premium"
googlePlayMethod.step3: Choose your plan and confirm with Google Play payment

telegramMethod.title: Via Telegram Bot
telegramMethod.savings: Save up to 35% vs app stores
telegramMethod.step3: Pay securely via Stripe — use code LAUNCH20 for 20% off

restore.title: Restore purchases
restore.desc: If your Premium features aren't showing after purchase, open the app → Profile → Subscription → Restore Purchases. This re-syncs your subscription with our servers.

cancel.title: Cancel subscription
cancel.desc: For App Store: Settings → Apple ID → Subscriptions → Doppler VPN → Cancel. For Google Play: Google Play → Account → Subscriptions → Cancel. Your access continues until the end of the billing period.

switch.title: Switch plans
switch.desc: You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time through the same platform you subscribed on. The change takes effect at the next billing cycle.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-platform subscriptions
crossPlatform.desc: Subscriptions purchased through the App Store only work on iOS. Google Play subscriptions only work on Android. For cross-platform access, subscribe via the Telegram bot — it works everywhere.

servers.title: Global Server Network
servers.subtitle: Choose from multiple locations worldwide. All servers support dual-protocol architecture.
